```{r setup}
library(tidyverse)
library(lubridate)
library(magrittr)
```

```{r}
on_mday(5) %>% 
  only_occur(in_month("Jan", "Feb")) %>% 
  only_occur(on_or_after(dmy("01/01/2000"))) %>% 
  only_occur(in_year(2000:2001)) %>% 
  get_events(n = 5)
```

```{r}
on_yday(1) %>% 
  #only_occur(on_or_after(ymd_hms("2011-01-01 14:05:00 UTC"))) %>% 
  get_events(since = ymd_hms("2011-01-01 14:05:00 UTC"),
             until = ymd_hms("2011-01-02 12:00:00 UTC"),
             #during = 2011, 
             every = "minute",
             every_n = 90)
```
